donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: The project expects to identify the areas of priority to focus on for disaster planning and management within each sector/Ministry. These priority areas will lay the foundation for developing Lao PDR's National Disaster Preparedness framework and Ministry's Business Continuity Plans. These plans should be in line with the existing in-country Avian Influenza Pandemic Control and Preparedness Plans, Regional ASEAN Disaster Preparedness Plans, and Global guidelines. The project also expects to lay the foundation for other non-health sectors to develop their pandemic preparedness plans. The project is also plans to identify linkages between the multi-sectoral pandemic preparedness plans and the disaster preparedness framework. Areas of synergy and possible collaboration between other regional projects, national government strategies and the in-country UN and NGO projects would also be identified.
